message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $110? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
